desc: Nonalcoholic Brooklyn Brewed Sorrel is a beloved brewed and aged beverage with an over 400-year Caribbean heritage. Our beverage is made with raw and natural ingredients: sorrel flower (aka hibiscus roselle), ginger, spices and orange peel. It has a rich, smooth, sweet, spicy, and complex taste. Great mocktail or mixer

layout.text: Non-alcoholic Hibiscus-spiced Caribbean mocktail- “It tastes better than wine”

- Cyndi M
Celebrated by Bon Appetit magazine, Epicurious, James Beard Foundation, Beyoncé and countless fans.
Our non-alcoholic brewed & aged hibiscus-spiced mocktail is delightfully complex and well balanced. Enjoy solo, as a mixer or uplifter for your next foodie experience.
